definition[0]: if someone in authority, especially the army, requisitions a building, vehicle, or food, they officially demand to have it during an emergency such as a war
example[0]: The building was requisitioned as a military hospital for the duration of the war.
definition[1]: an official written order for something
example[2]: The department must receive apurchase requisition before the items can be supplied.
definition[2]: to officially ask for something in writing
example[3]: One of its stakeholders has requisitioned an extraordinary general meeting.
